articles.author: Sid Lowe
articles.title: How Barcelona won La Liga: the story behind success for a new era | Sid Lowe - The Guardian
articles.description: This is a different Barça. It is, as Xavi insists, a team in construction, but it is one whose success has brought stability
articles.content: In the end, no one could catch Barcelona, not even the Espanyol fans who chased them off the pitch and down the tunnel although they got closer than anybody else. The banner at the RCDE Stadium on Su… [+16601 chars]

articles.author: Ben Husband
articles.title: Man Utd rocked by fresh injury blow with Erik ten Hag signing ruled out for season - The Mirror
articles.description: Manchester United have confirmed that Marcel Sabizter will miss the rest of the season, with a knee injury set to keep him on the sidelines until after next month's FA Cup final
articles.content:
Manchester United have confirmed Marcel Sabizters season is over after suffering a knee injury.
Signed on loan from Bayern Munich during the January window, the Austrian has impressed in the centre … [+3632 chars]

articles.title: James Anderson groin strain raises England Ashes fears - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Veteran seamer to be assessed ahead of Ireland Test after limping out of Lancashire fixture
articles.content: James Anderson suffered a groin injury while playing for Lancashire  •  Getty Images
